Verses: 1 vaaraththin Mudhal Naal Kaalaiyil, Adhiga Iruttode, Magadhalenaa Mariyaal Kallaraiyinidaththirku Vandhu Kallaraiyai Adaiththirundha Kal Eduththuppottirukkakkandaal.

2 udane Aval Odi, Seemon Pedhuruvinidaththilum Yesuvukku Anbaayirundha Matra Seeshanidaththilum Poi: Karththaraik Kallaraiyilirundhu Eduththukkondu Poivittaargal, Avarai Vaiththa Idam Engalukkuth Theriyavillai Endraal.
3 appozhudhu Pedhuruvum Matra Seeshanum Kallaraiyinidaththirkup Pogumpadi Purappattu, Iruvarum Orumiththu Odinaargal.
4 pedhuruvaippaarkkilum Matra Seeshan Thuridhamaai Odi, Mundhik Kallaraiyinidaththil Vandhu,
5 adharkulle Kunindhupaarththu, Seelaigal Kidakkiradhaik Kandaan; Aanaalum Avan Ulle Pogavillai.
6 seemon Pedhuru Avanukkuppinne Vandhu, Kallaraikkulle Pravesiththu,
7 seelaigal Kidakkiradhaiyum, Avarudaiya Thalaiyil Sutriyirundha Seelai Matrachcheelaigaludane Vaiththiraamal Thaniye Oru Idaththile Surutti Vaiththirukkiradhaiyum Kandaan.
8 mundhik Kallaraiyinidaththirku Vandha Matra Seeshanum Appozhudhu Ulle Pravesiththu, Kandu Visuvaasiththaan.
9 avar Mariththorilirundhu Ezhundhirukkavendum Engira Vedhavaakkiyaththai Avargal Innum Ariyaadhirundhaargal.
10 pinbu Andha Seeshargal Thangaludaiya Idaththirkuth Thirumbipponaargal.
11 mariyaal Kallaraiyinaruge Veliye Nindru Azhudhukondirundhaal; Appadi Azhudhukondirukkaiyil Aval Kunindhu Kallaraikkulle Paarththu,
12 yesuvin Sareeram Vaikkappattirundha Idaththile Velludai Thariththavargalaai Irandu Thoodhargal, Thalaimaattil Oruvanum Kaalmaattil Oruvanumaaga, Utkaarndhirukkiradhaik Kandaal.
13 avargal Avalai Nokki: Sthreeye, En Azhugiraai Endraargal. Adharku Aval: En Aandavarai Eduththukkondu Poivittaargal, Avarai Vaiththa Idam Enakkuth Theriyavillai Endraal.
14 ivaigalai Sollip Pinnaagath Thirumbi, Yesu Nirkiradhaik Kandaal; Aanaalum Avarai Yesu Endru Ariyaadhirundhaal.

15 yesu Avalaip Paarththu Sthreeye, En Azhugiraai, Yaaraith Thedugiraai Endraar. Aval, Avaraith Thottakkaaranendru Enni: Aiyaa, Neer Avarai Eduththukkonduponadhundaanaal, Avarai Vaiththa Idaththai Enakku Sollum, Naan Poi Avarai Eduththukkolluven Endraal.
16 yesu Avalai Nokki: Mariyaale Endraar. Aval Thirumbip Paarththu: Rabooni Endraal; Adharkup Podhagare Endru Arththamaam.

17 yesu Avalai Nokki: Ennaith Thodaadhe, Naan Innum En Pidhaavinidaththirku Erippogavillai; Nee En Sagodhararidaththirkup Poi, Naan En Pidhaavinidaththirkum Ungal Pidhaavinidaththirkum, En Dhevanidaththirkum Ungal Dhevanidaththirkum Erippogiren Endru Avargalukku Sollu Endraar.
18 magadhalenaa Mariyaal Poi, Thaan Karththaraik Kandadhaiyum, Avar Thannudane Sonnavaigalaiyum Seesharukku Ariviththaal.

19 vaaraththin Mudhalnaalaagiya Andraiyaththinam Saayangaalavelaiyile Seeshargal Koodiyirundha Idaththil, Yoodhargalukkup Bayandhadhinaal Kadhavugal Poottiyirukkaiyil, Yesu Vandhu Naduve Nindru: Ungalukku Samaadhaanam Endraar.
20 avar Ippadi Sollith Thammudaiya Kaigalaiyum Vilaavaiyum Avargalukkuk Kaanbiththaar. Seeshargal Karththaraikkandu Sandhoshappattaargal.
21 yesu Marupadiyum Avargalai Nokki: Ungalukku Samaadhaanamundaavadhaaga; Pidhaa Ennai Anuppinadhupola Naanum Ungalai Anuppugiren Endru Solli,
22 avargalmel Oodhi: Parisuththa Aaviyaip Petrukkollungal;
23 evargaludaiya Paavangalai Mannikkireergalo Avaigal Avargalukku Mannikkappadum, Evargaludaiya Paavangalai Manniyaadhirukkireergalo Avaigal Avargalukku Mannikkappadaadhirukkum Endraar.
24 yesu Vandhirundhapodhu Panniruvaril Oruvanaagiya Thidhimu Ennappatta Thomaa Enbavan Avargaludanekooda Irukkavillai.

25 matra Seeshargal: Karththaraik Kandom Endru Avanudane Sonnaargal. Adharku Avan: Avarudaiya Kaigalil Aanigalinaalundaana Kaayaththai Naan Kandu, Andhak Kaayaththile En Viralaiyittu, En Kaiyai Avarudaiya Vilaavile Pottaalozhiya Visuvaasikkamaatten Endraan.

26 marupadiyum Ettunaalaikkuppinbu Avarudaiya Seeshargal Veettukkulle Irundhaargal; Thomaavum Avargaludanekooda Irundhaan; Kadhavugal Poottappattirundhadhu. Appozhudhu Yesu Vandhu Naduve Nindru: Ungalukku Samaadhaanam Endraar.
27 pinbu Avar Thomaavai Nokki: Nee Un Viralai Inge Neetti, En Kaigalaip Paar, Un Kaiyai Neetti, En Vilaavile Podu, Avisuvaasiyaayiraamal Visuvaasiyaayiru Endraar.
28 thomaa Avarukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: En Aandavare! En Dhevane! Endraan.
29 adharku Yesu: Thomaave, Nee Ennaik Kandadhinaale Visuvaasiththaai, Kaanaadhirundhum Visuvaasikkiravargal Baakkiyavaangal Endraar.
30 indhap Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyiraadha Veru Anega Arpudhangalaiyum Yesu Thamadhu Seesharukku Munbaaga Seydhaar.
31 yesu Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Kristhu Endru Neengal Visuvaasikkumpadiyaagavum, Visuvaasiththu Avarudaiya Naamaththinaale Niththiyajeevanai Adaiyumpadiyaagavum, Ivaigal Ezhudhappattirukkiradhu.
